title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 2.7 - Requests for records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 2.7 - Requests for records

State Regulations
(a) Requests
for access to, correction or amendment of records shall be made in writing. All
requests shall be filed with or referred to the personal privacy compliance
officer. (b) A request shall
reasonably describe the record sought. When possible, the data subject should
supply identifying information to assist the department in locating the records
sought. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
2.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
